mapper.select: SELECT ps.idposts, ps.content, ps.created_at, ps.userId, IFNULL(lks.likes, 0) as likes, IF(b.postId, 1, 0) as melike FROM talelorz.posts AS ps LEFT JOIN talelorz.posts_likes AS lks ON ps.idposts = lks.postId LEFT JOIN (SELECT postId, userId FROM talelorz.likes_by WHERE userId = #{userId}) AS b ON ps.idposts = b.postId ORDER BY ps.idposts DESC LIMIT ${limit}

SELECT ps.idposts, ps.content, ps.created_at, ps.userId, IFNULL(lks.likes, 0) as likes, IF(b.postId, 1, 0) as melike FROM talelorz.posts AS ps LEFT JOIN talelorz.posts_likes AS lks ON ps.idposts = lks.postId LEFT JOIN (SELECT postId, userId FROM talelorz.likes_by WHERE userId = #{userId}) AS b ON ps.idposts = b.postId WHERE ps.idposts < ${idcursor} ORDER BY ps.idposts DESC LIMIT ${limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO talelorz.posts_likes (postId, likes, window10m) VALUES(${postId}, 1, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE likes=likes+1
mapper.select: SELECT likes, window10m FROM posts_likes WHERE postId = ${postId}
